title: Ticket #4782: Recognize My in native ClassAds
description:
In the ClassAds compatibility class, we add and remove a My attribute every time we do an evaluation or reference tracking. The native ClassAds library already has a special self attribute that refers to the current ad (which we use to implement My). If we had the library recognize My the same as self, then we eliminate lots of temporary modifications of the ad in the compatibility class and callers could use the native ClassAd evaluation methods.

We could make the recognition of My contingent on _useOldClassAdSemantics being set to true, so users of ClassAds other than HTCondor wouldn't see it.
